section.title: Conventions
section.para: The OpenPOWER Foundation documentation uses several typesetting conventions.

important.para: Something you must be aware of before proceeding.

warning.para: Critical information about the risk of data loss or security issues.

simplesect.title: Command prompts
simplesect.para: In general, examples use commands from the Linux operating system. Many of these are also common with Mac OS, but may differ greatly from the Windows operating system equivalents.
For the Linux-based commands referenced, the following conventions will be followed:

listitem.para: Any user, including the root user, can run commands that are prefixed with the $ prompt.
The root user must run commands that are prefixed with the # prompt. You can also prefix these commands with the sudo command, if available, to run them.
